result.title: Looking for a Coach â€” ICPC team
result.content: Hi Guys, we have recently form this team, but we are already more than a year involved in programming competitions, we have a basic knowledge, but we think that our individual efforts are not enough :(, so we are looking for someone that guides us not only with topics and problems but with hints and tricks ;). We don't want to be exigent, but we are looking for an experimented programmer that can spend some time in our training. Thank you all.
